mapper.select: SELECT n_note_task_submission_record.id, n_note_task_submission_record.note_task_id, n_note_task_submission_record.user_id, n_note_task_submission_record.note_id, n_note_task_submission_record.submit_time, n_note_task_submission_record.is_delete, n_note_task_submission_record.create_by, n_note_task_submission_record.create_time, n_note_task_submission_record.update_by, n_note_task_submission_record.update_time, n_note_task_submission_record.remark, sys_user.username, sys_user.nickname, n_note.title as note_title, n_note_task_submission_record.note_history_id FROM n_user_note_task LEFT JOIN sys_user ON n_user_note_task.user_id = sys_user.id LEFT JOIN n_note_task_submission_record ON (n_note_task_submission_record.note_task_id = n_user_note_task.note_task_id AND n_note_task_submission_record.user_id = n_user_note_task.user_id) LEFT JOIN n_note ON n_note_task_submission_record.note_id = n_note.id WHERE n_user_note_task.note_task_id = #{noteTaskId} AND n_user_note_task.status = #{userTaskStatus}
